downloadTitle: Hotfix for Microsoft System Center Orchestrator 2016 UR4 (KB 4058492)
downloadDescription: This release contains a hotfix for System Center Orchestrator 2016 UR4 (KB 4058492)
detailsSection:
Summary

This release contains a hotfix for System Center Orchestrator 2016 UR4. After applying UR4 the RunbookServerMonitorService.exe may not be able to connect to the database. This release provides a fix for this problem and should only be applied after applying System Center Orchestrator 2016 UR4. This issue has been detailed in KB 4058492.
systemRequirementsSection: Please note that this hotfix in only applicable for deployments running Microsoft System Center 2016 Orchestrator which have already applied UR4.
installInstructionSection:
To install this update, follow these steps:
  1. Download the update file
  2. Click to open the file and accept the license terms
  3. Select the location where you want to extract the files contained in the update
  4. Navigate to the location where the extracted files are present and follow the steps in the Readme file
